name: caro-back
description: 後端 Web 開發用 framework
author: Caro.Huang <carozozo@yahoo.com.tw>

scripts.app: NODE_ENV=dev pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-dev;npm run log.app
scripts.app:beta: NODE_ENV=beta pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-beta;npm run log.app:beta
scripts.app:alpha: NODE_ENV=alpha pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-alpha;npm run log.app:alpha
scripts.app:prod: NODE_ENV=prod pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-prod;npm run log.app:prod
scripts.cron: NODE_ENV=dev pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-cron-dev;npm run log.cron
scripts.cron:beta: NODE_ENV=beta pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-cron-beta;npm run log.cron:beta
scripts.cron:alpha: NODE_ENV=alpha pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-cron-alpha;npm run log.cron:alpha
scripts.cron:prod: NODE_ENV=prod pm2 startOrRestart ecosystem.config.js --only caro-back-cron-prod;npm run log.cron.prod
scripts.test.doc: DOC=true npm run test; apidoc -i docs -o public/apidoc/v$npm_package_version/
